name: Add new rows in Google Sheets for new RapidReg registrations
description: Every time there is a new RapidReg registration, Make will automatically add a new row to specified Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Wv8W9Yr01Ghpzaji5AjcHGQwKybi1HdM97apONqZGso/edit?usp=sharing). You can always add there columns that you need.
